xwikidoc.title: IRC Archive for channel #medsavant on 13 June 2013
xwikidoc.content: <bvancea> has joined #medsavant 10:47 <sdumitriu> Hey bvancea 10:47 <bvancea> hello sdumitriu 10:47 <bvancea> what's up? 10:51 <sdumitriu> Going to the lab 10:52 <bvancea> ah, you're on mobile? 10:55 <bvancea> well, I used the medsavant parser to parse variants and then upload to solr 10:55 <bvancea> but its not working properly for some reason 11:13 <sdumitriu1> has joined #medsavant 11:26 <sdumitriu1> How exactly isn't it working properly? 11:31 <bvancea> the info fields are not indexed properly 11:31 <bvancea> I'm pretty sure its something I did wrong 11:31 <bvancea> when adding the fields to solr 11:31 <bvancea> :) 11:38 <bvancea> also, the medsavant parser does not split multi-valued fields like alt 11:38 <bvancea> and I think we need those values to actually be multivalued 11:38 <sdumitriu1> Yes 11:39 <bvancea> hmm, which means it would be actually faster if I just modified my parser 11:39 <bvancea> and after we get to a stable schema, integrate it 11:40 <sdumitriu1> Yes 11:40 <bvancea> well then, thats what I'll be doing 11:41 <bvancea> btw, in my first email you sent to me you told me to register at https://gsoc.ccm.sickkids.ca 11:41 <bvancea> I can't really find the register button 11:41 <bvancea> :| 11:42 <sdumitriu1> Hm... 11:42 <sdumitriu1> Right 11:43 <bvancea> I mean, I only found the log in section 11:43 <sdumitriu1> Try now 11:44 <bvancea> nice, thanks 12:14 <sdumitriu> has joined #medsavant
